CustomField.formula: Approver__r.FirstName + ' ' + Approver__r.LastName + IF( Approver2__c != null && Approver2__c != Approver__c, ', ' + Approver2__r.FirstName + ' ' + Approver2__r.LastName, '') + IF( Approver3__c != null && Approver3__c != Approver__c, ', ' + Approver3__r.FirstName + ' ' + Approver3__r.LastName, '') + IF( Approver4__c != null && Approver4__c != Approver__c, ', ' + Approver4__r.FirstName + ' ' + Approver4__r.LastName, '')
CustomField.label: Assigned Approvers
